name: Forged Sand Interrogator
description:
A valiant warrior of the canyon, and a tribal guardian who patrols the crystal mountains and rivers.
A tribal warrior wielding a ball-headed club, she can turn even the hardest of rocks into dust with her crushing blows. When not using her weapon to fight, she instead often smashes open rocks in search of precious gems and traces of phlogiston crystals.

investigation.name: Sauroform Tribal Warriors
investigation.description: The warriors of Natlan's six great tribes who fight for the honor and glory of their people.\nOver long years of living and fighting alongside their Saurian companions, these tribal warriors have gradually acquired their traits and learned how to apply them on the field of battle.
